title: How long does it take to die after cutting my radial artery? - Quora

response.answer_text: Wow dude (that’s a non-gender specific dude by the way I don’t know how to check who asked the question) I really hope that this is just a curiosity question cause if it’s for any other reason you really need to talk to someone before you try and do something you might regret or you can spend time with anyone to maybe realize what you didn’t realize before if you need to talk then there’s a whole community of people here willing to help and listen.
